Value.label: Report threshold
Value.Help: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4.11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

Value.label: Whole Smart Strip Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Whole Smart Strip).

Value.label: Socket 1 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 1).

Value.label: Socket 2 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 2).

Value.label: Socket 3 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 3).

Value.label: Socket 4 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 4).

Value.label: Socket 5 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 5).

Value.label: Socket 6 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 6).

Value.label: Whole Smart Strip Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Whole Smart Strip).

Value.label: Socket 1 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 1).

Value.label: Socket 2 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 2).

Value.label: Socket 3 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 3).

Value.label: Socket 4 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 4).

Value.label: Socket 5 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 5).

Value.label: Socket 6 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 6).

Value.label: Notification status
Value.Help: Defines the automated status notification of an associated device when status changes

Value.label: Temperature of Smart Strip
Value.Help: Get temperature of Smart Strip

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Configure auto report which information as Group 1. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 bit 7 reserved bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6) bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5) bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4) bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3) bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2) bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1) bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval Value 4 (lsb) bit 7 reserved bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6) bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5) bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4) bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3) bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2) bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1) bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Configure auto report which information as Group 2. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 bit 7 reserved bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6) bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5) bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4) bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3) bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2) bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1) bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval Value 4 (lsb) bit 7 reserved bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6) bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5) bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4) bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3) bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2) bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1) bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Configure auto report which information as Group 3. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 bit 7 reserved bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6) bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5) bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4) bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3) bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2) bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1) bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval Value 4 (lsb) bit 7 reserved bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6) bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5) bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4) bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3) bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2) bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1) bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval

Value.label: Set 111-113 to default
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

Value.label: Configuration Locked
Value.Help: Enable/disable Configuration Locked

Value.label: Enter Meter Calibration Mode
Value.Help: Enter Meter Calibration Mode

Value.label: Device tag
Value.Help: Device tag.

Value.label: Reset device
Value.Help: Reset to the default configuration.
